name: Their Beastly Candle
description:
Welcome to Their Beastly Candle!

Swap columns to prepare candles for your customers according to their preferences.

Press Z to swap and X to fast-drop

Two types of candles can be made:

 1) Solid color (all red, blue, etc)

 2) Symmetrical (Red, Blue, Green, Blue, Red)

Submitting a 3+ length candle starts a combo, guaranteeing a bonus flame.

Each customer has different likes/dislikes.

Keep them satisfied before they leave or you'll get hit with a penalty!
